column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ordered the Tonkotsu Black which was just alright. Didn't come with bamboo shoots which I love
column2: so I ordered it on the side. The bamboo shoots weren't the small
column3: neat little rectangular slivers that are easy to eat. Instead
column5: that are annoying and have to be cut up in your bowl awkwardly. The mushrooms were just your basic mushrooms
column8: essentially nothing worth an additional $2.00. The pork belly fell apart in the bowl which proved to be difficult to eat since you had to go searching for it. The broth was a little bit.. buttery? for my taste. Left a weird film on my lips that I just didn't care for. The egg and the noodles were good though...
